items.content_html: API stands for ‚ÄúApplication Programming Interface.‚Äù An API is a software intermediary that allows two applications to talk to each other. In other words, an API is the messenger that delivers your request to the provider that you‚Äôre requesting it from and then delivers the response back to you. JSON stands for JavaScript Object Notation JSON is a lightweight format for storing and transporting data JSON is often used when data is sent from a server to a web page JSON is "self-describing" and easy to understand.
